rules: Rule1: If the bus is accelerating, then it is moving.
Rule2: Either the bus is braking or it is running.
Rule3: Provided that the bus is at a red traffic light, it is not braking.
Rule4: Whenever the bus turns left, it is at a red traffic light.
Rule5: In the event that the bus turns right, it is at a red traffic light.
Rule6: If the bus is parked, then it is stopped.
Rule7: Should the bus be on schedule, then if it is not the case that whenever passengers are not alighting, boarding does not occur, and the bus is waiting, then the bus is moving.
Rule8: Either the bus has WiFi or, if it has a strong GPS signal, then it is on schedule.
Rule9: If the bus is running, then if it is not the case that the bus is not operational implies it has many passengers, then the bus is delayed.
Rule10: Whenever the bus is at Central station, it is operational.
Rule11: The bus is at Central station or at the downtown stop.
Rule12: Either the bus is boarding passengers or, if it is at the downtown stop, then it is operational.
Rule13: Should it not be that the bus is turning left or turning right, then the bus is parked.
Rule14: In the event that it is not the case that the bus is turning left or turning right, then the bus is not stopped.
Rule15: Whenever it is not the case that if passengers are not alighting implies boarding does not occur, and the bus is waiting, then the bus is accelerating.
Rule16: If it is not the case that whenever passengers are not alighting, boarding does not occur, and the bus is waiting, then the bus is not moving.
Rule17: Should it not be that if the bus is not running, then it does not have a mechanical issue, then the bus requires repair.
Rule18: If the bus is not running, then it has a mechanical issue.
facts: Fact1: The bus has a strong GPS signal.
Fact2: The bus is alighting passengers.
Fact3: It is not the case that the bus has many passengers.
Fact4: The bus is not waiting.
Fact5: The bus is not delayed.
Fact6: The bus does not have WiFi.
Fact7: The bus does not require repair.
